name: wiltshire
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a county (= area with its own local government) in southwestern England: She runs a bed and breakfast in Castle Combe in Wiltshire.
More examplesFewer examplesThe author lives near the 5,000-year-old circle of standing stones at Avebury in Wiltshire. Phil Hall, from Wiltshire, works in the printing industry.Timber-framed barns have survived in an area extending from Wiltshire and Hampshire across to Suffolk and Kent.The roads to the south of Swindon are the responsibility of Wiltshire county council.
